// start of variable space: M[8] = 1024
LDA 0, 0, 0, 1
0000110000000001
SRC 0, 1, 1, 10
0110010001101010
STR 0, 0, 0, 8
0000100000001000

// RFS 0 for obtaining PC + 1: M[10] = 13312 = 2^14 - 3072 = 2^14 - (2^11 + 2^10)
LDA 0, 0, 0, 3
0000110000000011
SRC 0, 1, 1, 10
0110010001101010
STR 0, 0, 0, 10
0000100000001010
LDA 0, 0, 0, 1
0000110000000001
SRC 0, 1, 1, 14
0110010001101110
SMR 0, 0, 0, 10
0001010000001010
STR 0, 0, 0, 10
0000100000001010
